set.name: Grab It and Exchange!! Rare Killers Pack: Volume 3

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {REVOLUTION CHANGE} Fire or Nature creature - (When one of your Fire or Nature creatures attacks, you may switch that creature with this creature from your hand.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may take a multicolored creature, show that creature to your opponent and put it on top of your deck. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Set
property.value: Grab It and Exchange!! Rare Killers Pack: Volume 3

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your darkness creatures. {INVASION}-Darkness creature that costs 3 or more (When one of your darkness creatures that costs 3 or more attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it.)|l (When one of your Darkness creature that costs 3 or more (When one of your darkness creatures that costs 3 or more attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it.)|l attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature , you may put the top 5 cards of your deck into your graveyard.

property.name: Set
property.value: Grab It and Exchange!! Rare Killers Pack: Volume 3

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ If you have a water or nature creature in the battle zone, put a creature that costs 5 or less from your graveyard into the battle zone. Otherwise, put a creature that costs 3 or less from your graveyard into the battle zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: Grab It and Exchange!! Rare Killers Pack: Volume 3

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all light and darkness cards from the revealed cards into your hand, and put the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Set
property.value: Grab It and Exchange!! Rare Killers Pack: Volume 3

card.name: Domitius, Evil Emperor of Five Dragonskind

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may choose a light creature, water creature, darkness creature, fire creature and nature creature that costs 7 or less and put them into the battle zone. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. {TRIPLE BREAKER}
